results.content: This course shows how experienced "JavaScripters" resource the DOM to generate properties, values, perform tests (& pre-test), ... to design their scripts. This is one of my favorite courses because I have trouble understanding where/how the JavaScript gurus come up with their mystifying logic. Now I'm one step closer to knowing.
